text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Pierces up to 3 Zombies, then the projectile comes back dealing damage to the Zombies it pierced. Can target Flying Zombies.
$(br)$(#bd951a)As the first new member to your home defense team, Bloomerang enjoys listening to his Bob Barley albums.

pages.text: $(#25228d)Bloomerangs can hit up to three targets in their lane, twice each coming and going!
